channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Light out in Amberley Road, 24th November
item.description:
Light out in Amberley Road which is causing residents to not be able to see as it is pitch black - resident little worried as lots of vulnerable people up their road and risk of burglaries...please can this be looked into
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amberley Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken paving stone, 24th November
item.description:
I have reported this before, on 17 Aug, 4 Nov, 12 Nov, 13 Nov, 20 Nov. It is a narrow walkway which is a busy cut through to Bermondsey Jubilee Line. It is a health hazard and very dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Gillison Walk, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Trash on street AGAIN, 24th November
item.description:
